goblin01.name: Goblin
goblin01.description: A mischievous green creature with a sharp grin.
goblin01.intro: The goblin snarls and prepares to strike!

Z.name: Zombie
Z.description: A decaying corpse that refuses to rest.

zombie01.name: Zombie
zombie01.description: A shambling undead with vacant eyes.
zombie01.intro: The zombie groans and lurches forward!

B.name: Bandit
B.description: A scruffy thief eyeing your belongings.
B.intro: The bandit lunges for your coin purse!
